item.title: install openssh on windows
item.description: The following are instructions on how to setup OpenSSH on various Windows server versions. This is great if you come from a Linux background and are very used to SSH for accessing machines. Windows Server 2019 First run PowerShell as Administrator. Next install SSH and SSHD for Windows: Add-WindowsCapability -Online -Name OpenSSH.Client~~~~0.0.1.0 Add-WindowsCapability -Online -Name OpenSSH.Server~~~~0.0.1.0 Start-Service sshd Set-Service -Name sshd -StartupType 'Automatic' Confirm installation by ensuring rules are correct:
